name: In Search of Simon
description:
In Search of Simon

How far would you go to live forever? In Search of Simon follows the story of an unnamed heroine in search of her brother, Simon, who himself flew across the galaxy for something he called the afterlife equation. The player must navigate strange worlds and retrieve Simon's lost audio logs left behind from his visits, offering clues to his next location.

Features
  • 3D Graphics
  • Dark Atmosphere
  • Voice Acting
  • 8 Unique Indigenous species
